trends: There have been no other sightings in Metaire
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving to pick up my oldest daughter for work and on my way to my car I saw a blinking light red and blue my youngest daughter said mom the plane isn't moving so I said it could be a star so we paid it no mind and left. when we arrived at my daughter job we noticed that there was a bright light on the left side of my car it was Oct 5,2013 at 8:16pm we waited for my daughter to get off for 15min and in those 15 min that thing didn't move. I took a picture of it and zoomed in it on my cell and I saw it wasn't a plane it was a UFO.
